hymn.title: O Lord, Thy boundless love to me

layout.singingstanza: O Lord, Thy bound -- less love to me No thought can reach, no tongue de -- clare; Oh, knit my thank -- ful heart to Thee, And reign with -- out a ri -- val there; Thine whol -- ly, Thine a -- lone I am; Lord, with Thy love my heart in -- flame.
